version_description:
Here's an update with:

- Tweeks to app notifications for the best deals!
- Clean sweep of bugs and crashes

Your feedback is important to us If you have any feedback or suggestions, write back to us. We look forward to hear from you.

- Now pay via Gift Vouchers (eCodes).
- A clean sweep of all bugs and crashes.

And there is more to come. We are working very hard to completely change your experience on our app!
Look forward to the next update where we serve your favourite food - EVERYDAY, EVERYTIME

We promised you a great experience - Here we are to serve your favourite food - EVERYDAY , EVERY TIME

* All New Look - Brand new look and feel; we're really proud of this release!
* Beautiful, new ordering experience for your favourite products like the McAloo Tikki, the McChicken, the McVeggie, the McSpicy, the Maharaja Mac, the McEgg and lots more!
* Customise your product - Want more onion and no lettuce? Sure, we make it the way you need.
* All new Payments experience to ensure hassle free transactions.
* Track your order - Know exactly when your order gets cooked, leaves the store & more
* Lots of under the hood changes for a slick user experience.

Look forward to more new features in the upcoming updates.

Thanks for sharing all your feedback. We are continuously improvising the app to serve your favourite food - EVERYDAY , EVERY TIME

* Free-charge Wallet Integration - Now Go cashless with Free-charge Wallet
======================================================================

* All New Look - Brand new look and feel; we're really proud of this release!
* Beautiful, new ordering experience for your favourite products like the McAloo Tikki, the McChicken, the McVeggie, the McSpicy, the Maharaja Mac, the McEgg and lots more!
* Customise your product - Want more onion and no lettuce? Sure, we make it the way you need.
* All new Payments experience to ensure hassle free transactions.
* Track your order - Know exactly when your order gets cooked, leaves the store & more
* Lots of under the hood changes for a slick user experience.

Look forward to more new features in the upcoming updates.
Minor Bug Fixes.

- A clean sweep of bugs
- UI / UX optimisations

- A clean sweep of bugs
- UI / UX optimisations

- Now you can place Advance orders via the app.

- UI / UX optimisations

- Now you can place Advance orders via the app.

- UI / UX optimisations

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve McDelivery.

Here's what's new:
- For all of you out there who love our food, we have a surprise loaded for you in this release; Look forward to the Loyalty program.
- A clean sweep of bugs and crashes.

We are listening to your feedback and working hard to improve McDelivery

Here's what's new:
- Hassle free payments using PayTm Wallet
- A clean sweep of bugs and crashes

Enjoy amazing coupons & offers on online food orders on McDelivery - McDonald’s India – West & South, India’s best food ordering & delivery app.
Bug fixes and UI improvement
Bug fixes and UI improvement
Bug fixes and UI improvement
We continuously upgrade our app and resolve bugs/crashes to make the food ordering experience as good as our awesome food.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

We have updated our app to make it easier to explore our menu and order through new McDelivery app. With our new home page, you can find your favourite burgers and meals upfront and also quickly apply your preferred customisation.
We have fixed some issues and crashes to improve your experience with the all new McDelivery app.
We keep improving our app experience regularly so that your ordering experience is as good as our awesome food.
